doc.field: The series includes digital files of records related to fundraising, publicity, and routine business operations such as financial records, annual reports, budgets, and Board minutes. There is also documentation about clinical trials taking place in New York City, client reports and testimonials, newsletters, and shopping lists for the various apartments. The library cannot provide access to all digital files due to file corruption, lack of required software, and/or system specifications. A full manifest of the individual files comprising the series is available from the reference librarian on request.
